description: Donald Trump Jr. co-founded 'Executive Branch', an ultra-exclusive private members club in Georgetown, Washington D.C., charging a $500,000 membership fee and catering to wealthy Trump allies and business moguls.
notes: Club provides networking opportunities for ultra-wealthy individuals seeking access to Trump administration networks

sources.title: Donald Trump Jr. co-founds new private members club, Executive Branch, with a $500,000 fee
Donald Trump Jr. plans to open an exclusive new Beltway club dubbed 'Executive Branch'
Trump-aligned club for the ultra rich launches in Washington

summary: Donald Trump Jr. launched 'Executive Branch', an exclusive private club in Georgetown for ultra-wealthy Trump allies, with a $500,000 membership fee and founding members including tech moguls David Sacks, Chamath Palihapitiya, and the Winklevoss twins.
title: Trump Jr. Launches 'Executive Branch', Ultra-Exclusive $500K Private Club in D.C.
